basic.floral_language:
Aeonium arboreum 'Atropureum'
Floriography: mysterious, beautiful, strong.
The tree aeonium is succulent plant with treelike stem. Rosette ordered leaves are dark purple, wide oval, thin, leathery and toothed at edges. Leaves turn into green if not sunbath well. It is very popular because of shape and color of the leaves.
The plant requires sunny habitat. It will go through dormancy in summer and should be remove from direct sunlight to a place with scattered light. Small blooms are yellow if flowered.

basic.color: Leaf color black purple, without adequate e sunlight, leaves turning to green

maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring, autumn, and winter
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely

basic.floral_language:
Aeonium arboreum
Floriography: elegant, blessed, beautiful
Is a large succulent. Has a classical and graceful appearance with green oval leaves in a rosette-like arrangement, leaf edges are serrated and turn red under abundant sunlight.
Likes adequate light, takes a short sleep under summer high temperatures, need take a shelter and reduce watering. Blooms sometimes with orange flowers.

basic.floral_language:
Aeonium decorum f. variegata
Floriography: bright, sunshine, beautiful 
Aeonium decorum f. variegata plant stature like the lotus. The flat blade is ovate, with short white hairs on the margin. The color of new leaves is pale yellow, with a small amount of light green. When sunny the leaf edge will turn orange to pink. In hot summer, the blade will become green, please pay attention to shading and control watering. Because of its bright color, easy care, it is deeply loved by the public. 
Like the sunshine, also is flowering. Plant will produce flower stem in the middle, with pale pink flowers.

basic.floral_language:
Aeonium sedifolium 
Floriography: enthusiastic, interesting, pretty
Aeonium sedifolium is small and cute, green leaves are tightly arranged like a small lotus. When sun light is adequate, leaves have purple marks and turn red with prolonged exposure. Leaf surfaces may be sticky with secreted fluid, which may trap insects and dust, can be washed by water.
Likes sunny days, leaves will close when in summer dormant period, shade properly under scattered light. Flowers sometimes with yellow flowers.

basic.floral_language:
Agave americana var.marginata-alba 
Floriography: selfless, fortitude, love.
Agave americana var.marginata-alba is a compact evergreen succulent plant. Leaves rosulately arranged, triangular or lanceolate with spines at edges. Besides ornamental cultivation, its applications include anti-bacteria, anti-inflammation, and etc.
This plant requires much sunlight but should be shaded during the noon of summer. Yellowish green flowers bloom occasionally.

basic.floral_language:
Aglaonema commutatum 'Pseudobracteatum'
Floriography: health, longevity, vitality 
Aglaonema nitidum is a kind of evergreen foliage plants. Because of its sleek large blades it is appreciated by the public. 
Aglaonema commutatum 'Pseudobracteatum' plant stature is elegant, has many branches. Leaf blades are elliptic, slightly leathery, dark green, decorated with white or light yellow patches on the surface, which greatly increase the ornamental value.   Aglaonema commutatum 'Pseudobracteatum' is resistant to shade, is suitable for the scattered light in the bright place. Maintained properly, it also can flower during May and June. Flowers are pale yellow.

basic.floral_language:
Alocasia macrorrhizos 
Floriography: sincere, delicate, pure
Alocasia macrorrhizos is from tropical rain forests, water often drips from the tip of leaf blade.
Alocasia macrorrhizos is an evergreen large plant with heart-shaped hypertrophy leaves in emerald green color. In a warm moist environment, water drips from leaf tips. It must be noted that the plant has poisonous, do not have direct contact.
Alocasia macrorrhizos likes half shaded environments, avoid direct sunlight. It flowers sometimes with flowers with spathe in pale yellow or white.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, blooms sometimes, light green or milky white spathe flower

maintenance.soil: Peat mixed with coarse sand soil
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, put in places with scattered light in summer, flowering time needs a period of 3-5h light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, only need keep soil moist, may spray water in the air or rub leaves with water
maintenance.fertilization: Need more fertilization, apply once every 10-15 days in spring and autumn, except winter
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves timely

basic.floral_language:
Anthurium andraeanum
Anthurium andraeanumFloriography: enthusiastic, bright, bold and unrestrained 
Anthurium andraeanumis one of the world precious flowers, cultivated from the flower kingdom of the Netherlands. 
Anthurium andraeanumflower such as fire, red bud is like a palm, tassel graceful palm a golden yellow flesh, vividly called spathe. Anthurium andraeanumis one of the world precious flowers, cultivated from the flower kingdom of the Netherlands. 
Anthurium andraeanumflower such as fire, red bud is like a palm, tassel graceful palm a golden yellow flesh, vividly called spathe. Because of their enthusiasm is bold and unrestrained individual character, events like wedding or new store opening, choosing it as decoration, increase the festive atmosphere. 
Anthurium andraeanummaintenance is simple, can bloom all year round, flowering for 2-3 months.
basic.blooming: Flowers year around with spathe flower, viewing period 2-3 months

maintenance.soil: Peat covered with a layer of sphagnum moss on soil surface to keep moisture
maintenance.sunlight: Likes moderate sunlight, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray water in the air or on leaves, reduce water in winter, keep soil moist
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove rotten roots, old diseased and dead leaves timely

basic.floral_language:
Astrophytum capricorne 
Floriography: strong, kind, persistent.
Succulent stem of the Astrophytum capricorne is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Astrophytum capricorne is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.
Astrophytum capricorne requires direct bright sunlight for growth. It blooms in certain conditions. Flower color could be light yellow, orange or pink.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers with a short period flowering time 2-3 days
basic.color: Green, flower color light yellow, orange, pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, put in sunny places, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering in winter dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring to autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely

basic.floral_language:
Astrophytum myriostigma
Floriography: charming, lovely, cute
Has a delicate cylindrical shape with 3-9, usually 5, rigid, fleshy, and pronounced vertical ribs forming a star-like shape observed from the top, high ornamental value.
Likes sunny places, shade properly under summer strong sunlight, does not have an apparent dormant period, often blooms in spring and summer. Flowers are light yellow.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, light yellow flowers

maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, no apparent period of dormancy, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer high temperature
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely

basic.floral_language:
Begonia boliviensis
Floriography: happy, gentle, calm
Begonia boliviensishas clustered huge flowers with beautiful and vivid colors, very charming. The flowers are a symbol of wealth and good fortune, together with Peony, represent "rich full house" Often used for interior decoration or flower beds.
Begonia boliviensis likes warm sunshine with a natural flowering time from April to June, for a period up to 2-3 weeks, and will blossom again in September to December with a good semi-dormant period in summer.
basic.blooming: Flowers year around, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes moderate sunshine, avoid direct strong light, slight shade tolerance
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, water daily in summer with 30-50 ml water, about 1/5-1/5 of a paper-cup
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased, dead leaves and withered flowers timely

basic.floral_language:
Bryophyllum manginii  
Floriography: happy, optimistic, youth 
The flowers alias star of longevity flowers, a symbol of prosperous, long long time, cultivated from the flower kingdom of the Netherlands. 
Plant type is compact, leaves are green, and color is rich. The flowers are crowned, like a small handfuls of color bright beautiful parasol. Commonly used as decoration in the home, or flower bed.

basic.floral_language:
Bryophyllum pinnatum 
Floriography: noble, beautiful, warm
Bryophyllum pinnatum has upright stems, large green leaves turning pale pink in the edge under sunny days. Strong reproductive ability by sprouting lateral buds at the edge of the leaves which develop roots after detached.
Likes sunny places, no dormancy. Flowers sometimes with bell-shaped flowers in orange-yellow.

basic.floral_language:
Burgundy Phalaenopsis
Floriography: elegant, quiet, wise
Burgundy Phalaenopsis has beautiful flowers like butterflies in serene tropical rainforests, one of the three national flowers in Indonesia.
Burgundy Phalaenopsis has a graceful looking with burgundy flower colors, white aerial roots surround leaves and butterfly-like flowers.
Burgundy Phalaenopsis blooms normally in January-February for more than 1-2 months. With modern regulation techniques, Phalaenopsis amabilis can flower year around.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-July, viewing period up to 1-2 months

basic.floral_language:
Crassula 'Pagoda Village'
Floriography:active, cute, beautiful
Has a tower-like shape, triangular leaves arranged layer by layer, bigger at the base and being smaller to the top. In a cool season with adequate sunlight, leaves turn red-brown to pink, and the plant becomes more compact. Very cute and often used to decorate desks and tables. 
Likes sunny places, has a short dormant period in summer, place under scattered light. Flowers sometimes, yellow color.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, when sunny turning to red brown to pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, dormant in summer under high temperatures, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely

basic.floral_language:
Crassula arborescens Willd
Floriography: broad, inclusive, handsome
Crassula arborescens Willd has thick stems with many branches, leaf blades gray-green to dark-green, inverted triangle shape and fleshy. Leaf color rarely changes, unless under a great diurnal temperature range and strong sunlight the edges become red. Typically used for outdoor and indoor landscaping.
Crassula arborescens Willd likes full sunlight with half shade tolerance, dormant in summer and avoid direct sunlight. May bloom with white to pale pink flowers.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, often flowers in late spring to early summer, white to pale pink flowers
basic.color: Leaf color gray green to dark green, when sunny leaf edges turning to red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade, short period of dormancy in summer, use half shade for better care
maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely

basic.floral_language:
Crassula capitella 'Campfire'
Floriography: passion, vitality, and beauty 
Campfire is a succulent plant, growing in bushes easily to produce collateral branches. The leaves are flat, with short teeth at the edge. The leaf color is yellow green. In cool season and when sunlight is sufficient, leaves turn red, making one feel passionate. 
Campfire like plenty of sunshine, semi shadow resistance. In hot summer, it enters a short dormancy, so place in the shade. It is blossoming from June to July with yellow-white flowers.

basic.color: Leaf color yellow green, when sunny leaf color turning to red

basic.floral_language:
Crassula conjuncta
Floriography: stylish, lucky, self-reliant.

Leaves of the C. conjuncta are larger than those of the necklace vine (C. perforata), dark green and thick. Leaf edges are reddish brown or brown if well sunbathed. Leaves stack and offset freely to form large clusters. It is a well-recognized indoor potted foliage plant.

The plant requires sunny habitat. Partial shade tolerant. Summer dormant, protect from direct sunlight. Cream colored flowers bloom in spring.

basic.floral_language:
Crassula marnieriana
Floriography: wealthy, lucky, warm.
Crassula marnieriana is a relatively fast growing "stacked" Crassula. Short broad ovate opposing leaves are light green, thick, congested at the leaf tips. Leaf edges turn into red to dark red if well sunbathed. This form has leaf margins that often have reddish tinges and is quite showy.
Crassula marnieriana is a full sun plant and partial shade tolerant. It will go through dormancy in summer and should be remove from direct sunlight to a place with scattered light. It blooms with inconspicuous pale yellow flowers in spring.

basic.floral_language:
Crassula Obliqua 'Gollum'
Floriography: handsome, innovative, unique
Crassula Obliqua 'Gollum' may have multiple woody stems with emerald green leaves in tubular shapes and wide top, having a elliptical cross section like a horseshoe. With a great diurnal temperature range and abundant sunlight, leaves turn golden yellow then red along cross-sectional edges. 
Crassula Obliqua 'Gollum' likes full sunlight with half shade tolerance, summer is its dormant period, need to avoid direct sunlight. Blooms sometime with white to pale pink flowers.

Succulent stem of the Cylindropuntia leptocaulis is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Cylindropuntia leptocaulis is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.

basic.floral_language:
Cymbidium aloifolium
Floriography: virtuous, tender, intelligent
Cymbidium aloifolium, commonly referred to as the Chinese orchid, represents simplicity and serenity.
Cymbidium aloifolium are graceful with slender leaves and colorful, exotic flowers with pure colors and fragrances, though not as huge as the orchids flowers in the West, but very elegant. For its high ornamental value, often used to decorate rooms.
Cymbidium aloifolium like half shaded environments. Flowering time differs in different varieties throughout the year with a month-long flowering time, promptly cut the scape after flowering for germination in the next year.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, viewing period 3-4 weeks
basic.color: Flower color light yellow to milky white, with chestnut color stripes

maintenance.soil: Breathable and loose planting materials with coconut shell, bark or sphagnum moss
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, in autumn and winter may take 2-3h sunlight, receive more light when leaves are dark green
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray to the ambient environment in summer, reduce watering in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Apply fertilizers every 10-15 days in the growing seasons of spring and autumn, foliar fertilizer spray also do good for its growth , fertilize under 10 ℃ (50 ℉) is forbidden
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, remove peduncle after flowering

Cymbidium tracyanum, commonly referred to as the Chinese orchid, represents simplicity and serenity.
Cymbidium tracyanum are graceful with slender leaves and colorful, exotic flowers with pure colors and fragrances, though not as huge as the orchids flowers in the West, but very elegant. For its high ornamental value, often used to decorate rooms.
Cymbidium tracyanum like half shaded environments. Flowering time differs in different varieties throughout the year with a month-long flowering time, promptly cut the scape after flowering for germination in the next year.

basic.floral_language:
Dendrobium aggregatum
Floriography: kind, philanthropic, brave.
Dendrobium aggregatum is one of the most widespread ornamental members of orchid family. The blooms are variegated in color, purple or yellow like a number of flying butterflies. It is widely cultivated in indoor pots and flower beds or edges.
Dendrobium aggregatum grows best in partial shade. Bright scatter light is an appropriate habitat. It blooms in April to May for two to three weeks.

basic.floral_language:
Dieffenbachia 'Big Ben' 
Floriography: health, longevity, vitality 
Aglaonema nitidum is a kind of evergreen foliage plants. Because of its sleek large blades it is appreciated by the public. 
Dieffenbachia 'Big Ben' plant stature is elegant, has many branches. Leaf blades are elliptic, slightly leathery, dark green, decorated with white or light yellow patches on the surface, which greatly increase the ornamental value.   Dieffenbachia 'Big Ben' is resistant to shade, is suitable for the scattered light in the bright place. Maintained properly, it also can flower during May and June. Flowers are pale yellow.

basic.floral_language:
Dracaena sanderiana 'Golden Edey'
Floriography: good fortune, joy, tenacity 
Lucky bamboo known as transit bamboo is a symbol of prosperous and peaceful. 
Lucky bamboo posture is natural and unrestrained graceful, internodes is like bamboo but not bamboo. Leaf shape is long ovoid to lanceolate, and leaf color is green. Usually as ornamental potted plant, it is put in the living room, desk and bedroom. 
Lucky bamboo likes semi shade. Avoid directly bright light, and place scattered light maintenance. Proper maintenance it will be flowering. Flower color is light purple.

basic.floral_language:
Echeveia 'Black Prince'
Floriography: noble, brave, mysterious
Echeveia 'Black Prince' has a characteristic black and purple leaf color, spectacular, and fleshy leaf blades with tips, tightly arranged in a rosette, like a blooming black lotus. The more abundant sunlight and greater diurnal temperature range, the shinier and blacker the leaves, otherwise in green. For its unique shape and noble colors, often used as small ornamental plants for family.

basic.floral_language:
Epipremnum aureum 
Floriography: strong, warm-hearted, optimistic
Epipremnum aureum is an evergreen plant with a tenacious vitality, known as the "devil's vine or devil's ivy" for being almost impossible to kill.
Has hypertrophy, green oval leaves, vines have a strong tendency to twist together, well-developed aerial roots can absorb moisture in the air and nutrients. Epipremnum aureum can be hanged in the room, or as a hydroponic plant.
It likes half shaded environments, place under scattered light.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, rarely flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients，亦可水培养护
maintenance.sunlight: Resistance to shade plant, put in places with bright scattered light, in winter may take 2-3h sunlight
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray water around the leaves
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead leaves timely

basic.floral_language:
Espostoa lanata 
Floriography: strong, kind, persistent.
Succulent stem of the Espostoa lanata is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Espostoa lanata is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.
Espostoa lanata requires direct bright sunlight for growth. It blooms in certain conditions. Flower color could be light yellow, orange or pink.

Graptopetalum 'Mirinae'
Floriography: Gentle, generous, beautiful
Graptopetalum 'Mirinae' looks like lotus flowers, leaves smaller than Graptosedum 'Francesco Baldi', oval shape with spine on the tip, green and smooth surface, turn pale pink when light is abundant. Often used in small pot succulent combos for indoor decorations.
Graptopetalum 'Mirinae' loves sunlight, but may be dormant in summer under high temperature, need reduce watering and sunlight exposure. Occasionally blooms with white slightly reddish flowers

Floriography: lovely, exquisite, tender

basic.floral_language:
Graptopetalum paraguayense
Floriography: strong, brave, philanthropic.
This plant is a species of succulent plant in the jade plant family, Crassulaceae. Layout of the thick leaves is similar to a blooming Indian lotus. So the plant was called 'the flower never withered' and became very popular.
The plant requires sunny habitat. Flowering occasionally, white, five-pointed star shaped.

Graptoveria Gilva
Floriography: glamorous, classical, strong
Graptoveria Gilva looks like five-pointed stars, leaves are in melon seed shape, narrower at the ends and wider in the middle, thin and in grayish green, covered by thin layer of white powders. Likes sun light, when in a short dormancy in summer high temperature, need reduce water. Blooms sometimes with yellow flowers.

basic.floral_language:
Gymnocalycium horstii 
Floriography: strong, kind, persistent.
Succulent stem of the Gymnocalycium horstii is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Gymnocalycium horstii is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.
Gymnocalycium horstii requires direct bright sunlight for growth. It blooms in certain conditions. Flower color could be light yellow, orange or pink.

basic.color: Green, flower color light yellow, orange, pink

maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering in winter dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring to autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely

basic.floral_language:
Hatiora gaertneri
Floriography: lucky, fine, tenacious.
Hatiora gaertneri is an epiphytic succulent plant. It grows a number of drooping branches. Each branch comprises of several connection branch sections. This plant usually grows on other trees or damp valleys.
Hatiora gaertneri prefers mild sunlight and is partial shade tolerant. It would go into a short dormancy in hot summer and should be removed to a cool and shaded place. Rose red or red flowers bloom in October to next February.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, rose red or red flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat mixed with coarse sand soil
maintenance.sunlight: Half shade plant, like moderate light, properly shade during half dormancy in summer
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer and winter
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn, except flowering time and dormancy in summer
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers and stem after flowering, except the 2-3 segments at the bottom of stem

basic.floral_language:
Hippeastrum hybridum
Floriography: hot, passionate, loyal
Has beautiful green leaves, scape sprouted from the middle of the leaf blades, one or several huge flowers on the top of scape, exotic and like lilies with beautiful red, orange, pink, or complex color. Commonly used in interior decoration or flower beds.
Hippeastrum hybridum likes the sun with tolerance to half shade, blooms in spring or winter, available for viewing in 2-3 weeks. After flowering, cut the scape and leave the bulbs for sprouting in the next year, normally may bloom for years.
basic.blooming: Flowering period in winter and spring, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Flower color red, orange red, blue purple

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, but avoid strong light, in summer put in places with bright scattered light, in winter full sun
maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 10-15 days in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely

basic.floral_language:
Kalanchoe blossfeldiana 
Floriography: happy, optimistic, youth 
The flowers alias star of longevity flowers, a symbol of prosperous, long long time, cultivated from the flower kingdom of the Netherlands. 
Plant type is compact, leaves are green, and color is rich. The flowers are crowned, like a small handfuls of color bright beautiful parasol. Commonly used as decoration in the home, or flower bed.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-August, viewing period 3-4 weeks

maintenance.soil: 80% peat + 20% perlite
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, shade properly under summer strong light, may take about 4-6 hours sunlight every day
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly every 4-5 days in summer, water thoroughly every 8-10 days in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove diseased, yellowing and dropping leaves, pinching 1-2 times, germinate more branched

basic.floral_language:
Monstera deliciosa
Floriography: health, happiness and energy 
Monstera deliciosa is the evergreen foliage plant. It has strong stem, and the aerial root of brown color, which can absorb water and nutrients in the air. Leaves are light green, peculiar shape, looking like a turtle, and coupled with much on stem section, much like bamboo, so it is called bamboo of curvature. Monstera deliciosa is often put in the sitting room, the facade, the beautification adornment effect. 
Monstera deliciosa likes the semi-shade environment, and it is grown in scattered light. Flowers are yellow-white spathe, and are generally difficult to bloom in domestic growth.

Narcissus 'Dutch Master' is extremely graceful, like a river fairy. Two types: China Narcissus and Daffodils. Daffodils has white flowers, yellow bowl-shaped paracorolla (inner corolla), rich scent. Floriography: confident, pure, beautiful
Narcissus 'Dutch Master' is extremely graceful, like a river fairy. Two types: China Narcissus and Daffodils. Daffodils has white flowers, yellow bowl-shaped paracorolla (inner corolla), rich scent. Flowers in winter. Daffodils have many varieties, with varied inner corolla shapes, lighter and elegant scent, bloom normally in April-May.
Daffodils likes sunshine, also resistant to half shade, period of flower viewing 2-3 weeks. After flowering, leave the bulbs for sprouting in the coming year, may normally blossom for years.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-April, viewing period 1-2 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Put in sunny places, resistant to half shade, dormant in summer under high temperature
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly only when soil is dry, reduce watering during flowering season, 1-2 times a week
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove the withered parts on the ground after flowering, leaving bulbs for germination in the next year

basic.floral_language:
Oncidium hybridum
Floriography: virtuous, tender, intelligent
Oncidium hybridum, commonly referred to as the Chinese orchid, represents simplicity and serenity.
Oncidium hybridum are graceful with slender leaves and colorful, exotic flowers with pure colors and fragrances, though not as huge as the orchids flowers in the West, but very elegant. For its high ornamental value, often used to decorate rooms.
Oncidium hybridum like half shaded environments. Flowering time differs in different varieties throughout the year with a month-long flowering time, promptly cut the scape after flowering for germination in the next year.
basic.blooming: Flowering period year around, viewing period 3-4 weeks
basic.color: Flower color mainly yellow, sometimes white, red

maintenance.soil: Breathable and loose planting materials with coconut shell, bark or sphagnum moss
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, in autumn and winter may take 2-3h sunlight, receive more light when leaves are dark green
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray to the ambient environment in summer, reduce watering in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Apply fertilizers every 10-15 days in the growing seasons of spring and autumn, foliar fertilizer spray also do good for its growth , fertilize under 10 ℃ (50 ℉) is forbidden
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, remove peduncle after flowering

basic.floral_language:
Opuntia chlorotica 
Floriography: strong, kind, persistent.
Succulent stem of the Opuntia chlorotica is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Opuntia chlorotica is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.
Opuntia chlorotica requires direct bright sunlight for growth. It blooms in certain conditions. Flower color could be light yellow, orange or pink.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers with a short period flowering time 2-3 days
basic.color: Green, flower color light yellow, orange, pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes strong light, put in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering in winter dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring to autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely

basic.floral_language:
Orange red Kalanchoe blossfeldiana 
Floriography: happy, optimistic, youth 
The flowers alias star of longevity flowers, a symbol of prosperous, long long time, cultivated from the flower kingdom of the Netherlands. 
Plant type is compact, leaves are green, and color is rich. The flowers are crowned, like a small handfuls of color bright beautiful parasol. Commonly used as decoration in the home, or flower bed.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-August, viewing period 3-4 weeks

maintenance.pruning: Remove diseased, yellowing and dropping leaves, pinching 1-2 times, germinate more branched

basic.floral_language:
Oreocereus celsianus 
Floriography: strong, kind, persistent.
Succulent stem of the Oreocereus celsianus is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Oreocereus celsianus is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.
Oreocereus celsianus requires direct bright sunlight for growth. It blooms in certain conditions. Flower color could be light yellow, orange or pink.

basic.floral_language:
Orostachys boehmeri
Floriography: strong, glorious, calm
Orostachys boehmeri is a beautiful plant with gray-green to blue-green thin leaves tightly arranged in a rosette. Has a strong reproductive capacity by lateral buds. With adequate light, the plant become compact, like a blossoming rose, has high ornamental value and favored by the public.
Likes sunny days, shade properly under summer strong light, dormant in winter. The plant usually dies after flowering, should cut the flower buds.

basic.floral_language:
Pachyphytum 'Dr Cornelius' 
Floriography: pure, grand, beautiful
Has a beautiful shape with thick fleshy and gray-green to blue-green leaves in an oval shape and arranged in a rosette, leaf surface has thick white powder. In a cool season with adequate light, leaves turn slightly red. Grows slowly, suitable for combinations with other potted succulents.
Likes adequate sunlight, no apparent dormant period. Flowers are purple to red.

basic.floral_language:
Pachyphytum cv.Momobijin 
Floriography: lovely, beautiful, warm.
Pachyphytum is a small genus of succulents in the Crassulaceae family. The name comes from the ancient Greek pachys (thick) and phyton (plant) after the thick leaves. The so called P. 'Blue Haze' or P. cv. MOMOBIJIN is the hybrid of P. bracteosum and P. glutinicaule. This cultivar possesses pink thick oval leaves with white powder covered. It looks prettier from distance with the pink cloth. The shape and arrange of the leaves make the plant look like a blooming Indian lotus from bird eye's view. 
The cultivar requires sunny habitat, turning white or green if it could not receive plenty of sunlight. Small red flowers bloom occasionally.

Pachyveria pachytoides has ovate leaves with round edges, blue-green, with a very thin layer of white powder, in sunny environments leaves become pale pink and the plant becomes more compact, has a high ornamental value, quite popular in recent years among small succulents.
Pachyveria pachytoides likes sunny places, no dormancy. Bloom sometimes with a long scape emerging from the center of leaves, orange flowers in a bell-shape.

Floriography: beautiful, vigorous, delicate

basic.floral_language:
Peperomia 'Honey jasper' 
Floriography: fresh, vigorous, exquisite
Peperomia 'Honey jasper' is an evergreen foliage plant, also known as "Jasper". It has a miniature compact form, lavender-color (pale purple) stems, oval or nearly round leaves, young leaves fresh green like a half bean, then turning to shiny dark green, very vivid and lovely. Usually put in the study, living room, bedroom, adding greenness and vitality, is a popular plant.
Peperomia 'Honey jasper' likes half shade environment, good for bright scattered light. Sometimes blooms with slender flowers, but with little viewing value.

basic.floral_language:
Phaius tankervilleae
Floriography: virtuous, tender, intelligent
Phaius tankervilleae, commonly referred to as the Chinese orchid, represents simplicity and serenity.
Phaius tankervilleae are graceful with slender leaves and colorful, exotic flowers with pure colors and fragrances, though not as huge as the orchids flowers in the West, but very elegant. For its high ornamental value, often used to decorate rooms.
Phaius tankervilleae like half shaded environments. Flowering time differs in different varieties throughout the year with a month-long flowering time, promptly cut the scape after flowering for germination in the next year.
basic.blooming: Flowering period year around, viewing period 3-4 weeks

maintenance.soil: Breathable and loose planting materials with coconut shell, bark or sphagnum moss
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, in autumn and winter may take 2-3h sunlight, receive more light when leaves are dark green
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray to the ambient environment in summer, reduce watering in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Apply fertilizers every 10-15 days in the growing seasons of spring and autumn, foliar fertilizer spray also do good for its growth , fertilize under 10 ℃ (50 ℉) is forbidden
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, remove peduncle after flowering

basic.floral_language:
Phalaenopsis
Floriography: elegant, quiet, wise
Phalaenopsis amabilis has beautiful flowers like butterflies in serene tropical rainforests, one of the three national flowers in Indonesia.
Phalaenopsis amabilis has a graceful looking with various flower colors, white aerial roots surround leaves and butterfly-like flowers.
Phalaenopsis amabilis blooms normally in January-February for more than 1-2 months. With modern regulation techniques, Phalaenopsis amabilis can flower year around.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-July, viewing period up to 1-2 months

maintenance.soil: In sphagnum moss, replace once a year
maintenance.sunlight: Before flowering put under gentle sunlight, avoid direct strong light, when flowering put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly every 5-7 days, may water by put the soil in water, may spray water in the air in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly, except flowering stages
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers and diseased leaves; remove peduncle after flowering, except the 2-3 segments at the bottom of peduncle, about 10cm

Floriography: elegant, quiet, wise
Phalaenopsis amabilis has beautiful flowers like butterflies in serene tropical rainforests, one of the three national flowers in Indonesia.
Phalaenopsis amabilis has a graceful looking with various flower colors, white aerial roots surround leaves and butterfly-like flowers.
Phalaenopsis amabilis blooms normally in January-February for more than 1-2 months. With modern regulation techniques, Phalaenopsis amabilis can flower year around.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-July, viewing period up to 1-2 months

maintenance.soil: In sphagnum moss, replace once a year
maintenance.sunlight: Before flowering put under gentle sunlight, avoid direct strong light, when flowering put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly every 5-7 days, may water by put the soil in water, may spray water in the air in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly, except flowering stages
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers and diseased leaves; remove peduncle after flowering, except the 2-3 segments at the bottom of peduncle, about 10cm

Floriography: blessed, vigorous, tenacious
Philodendron'con-go' is an evergreen foliage plant that can absorb toxic gases to clean the air. It has green and shiny leaves, thick and long oval shape. Usually put in the study, living room, bedroom, adding greenness.
Philodendron'con-go' likes half shaded environments, place under scattered light. Has spathe type flowers.

basic.floral_language:
Pink Anthurium andraeanum
Pink Anthurium andraeanumFloriography: enthusiastic, bright, bold and unrestrained 
Pink Anthurium andraeanumis one of the world precious flowers, cultivated from the flower kingdom of the Netherlands. 
Pink Anthurium andraeanumflower such as fire, red bud is like a palm, tassel graceful palm a golden yellow flesh, vividly called spathe. Because of their enthusiasm is bold and unrestrained individual character, events like wedding or new store opening, choosing it as decoration, increase the festive atmosphere. 
Pink Anthurium andraeanummaintenance is simple, can bloom all year round, flowering for 2-3 months.

basic.floral_language:
Portulaca molokiniensis
Floriography: blessed, grand, rich
The plant has strong stems often woody, with fleshy and round leaves like a pile of coins on the top, high ornamental value, often used in door as an evergreen foliar plant.
Likes abundant sunlight, tolerates to half shade, being dormant in summer, shade properly under scattered light. Flowers are yellow.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers

maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely

basic.floral_language:
Portulacaria afra
Floriography: wealthy, vigorous, delicate
Has an elegant plant form, fleshy thin leaves in nearly a heart shape, fresh green, with abundant sunlight, stems turn purple red and leaves are more rigid, grows fast and can be trimmed frequently for different shapes. 
Likes abundant sunlight, does not have an apparent dormant period. Flowers sometimes, pink to red color.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, pale pink to red flowers

basic.floral_language:
Purple Zantedeschia aethiopica 
Floriography: pure, loyal, guileless
Purple Zantedeschia aethiopica has a noble and classical image in the world. Has a straight upright stem with funnel-shaped flowers, like a horseshoe, very beautiful. Suitable being placed in the balcony, windows, desktop, adding a vivid and exotic atmosphere.
Purple Zantedeschia aethiopica likes sunny days, full bloom in spring for 1-2 month. After flowering, Leave the bulbs to sprout in the coming year, normally can bloom year after year.
basic.blooming: Flowering period November-May, viewing period 1-2 months

maintenance.soil: Peat and perlite mixed
maintenance.sunlight: Put in sunny places, but avoid strong sunlight at noon, less flowers with less sunlight
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil dries, spray water in the air when relative humidity lower than 30%
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly, except in summer
maintenance.pruning: After flowers fade put in a shaded place, when leaves turn yellow, remove the withered part on the ground, leave tubers for germination next year

basic.floral_language:
Rieger begonia 
Floriography: happy, gentle, calm
Rieger begonia has clustered huge flowers with beautiful and vivid colors, very charming. The flowers are a symbol of wealth and good fortune, together with Peony, represent "rich full house" Often used for interior decoration or flower beds.
Rieger begonia likes warm sunshine with a natural flowering time from April to June, for a period up to 2-3 weeks, and will blossom again in September to December with a good semi-dormant period in summer.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-June and September-December, September-December, viewing period 2-3 weeks

basic.floral_language:
Rohdea japonica
Floriography: health, longevity, vitality 
Rohdea japonica is a kind of evergreen foliage plants. Because of its sleek large blades it is appreciated by the public. 
Rohdea japonica plant stature is elegant, has many branches. Leaf blades are elliptic, slightly leathery, dark green, decorated with white or light yellow patches on the surface, which greatly increase the ornamental value.   Rohdea japonica is resistant to shade, is suitable for the scattered light in the bright place. Maintained properly, it also can flower during May and June. Flowers are pale yellow.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers in May-June, light yellow flowers

maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves timely

basic.floral_language:
Sedeveria letizia
Floriography: enthusiastic, brave, beautiful
Has a beautiful plant form, fleshy green leaves with tips, leaves are compact in a rosette, with adequate sunlight, leaves turn red, and more compact, forming a mixture of red and green color, like green flames. 
Likes sunshine, has a short dormant period under summer high temperature, place under scattered light. Flowers sometimes, white color.

basic.floral_language:
Sempervivum arachnoideum ssp. tomentosum
Floriography: wonderful, characteristic, tough
Has a peculiar plant form with multiple layers of fleshy leave arranged like a ball, with many silk-like tissues around the leaf tips, like cobwebs, in a cool season with abundant sunlight, the plant is more compact and lower leaf surface turns purple red. 
Likes sunshine, has a short dormant period under summer high temperature, place under scattered light. Flowers sometimes, pink color, but usually the plant dies after flowering.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, pink flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, when sunny lower surface turning to fuchsia

basic.floral_language:
Sempervivum arachnoideum'Rubrum' 
Floriography: self-reliant, confident, glamorous
Sempervivum arachnoideum'Rubrum' is a well-known fine succulent with a classical and grand appearance, has fleshy colorful leaves arranged in a rosette, whit adequate sunshine leaves are more compact and turn purple, so also known as "purple peony".
Likes sunlight, take a short dormancy in summer, should shade properly under scattered light. Flowers sometimes with scapes from the middle of the plant with pink flower.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, pink flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, when sunny leaf color turning to fuchsia

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, a short period of dormancy in summer, use half shade for better care
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely

basic.floral_language:
Sempervivum tectorum
Floriography: pure, beautiful, and happiness 
Sempervivum tectorum is a small succulent plant. Fleshy, succulent leaves tightly arranged like a blooming lotus flower, and lateral buds are easily sprouted. Leaves are rich in color. In the cool and sunny season, leaf tip becomes purple red. The fleshy plants can match a variety of delicate small plants as miniature landscape, which is very popular in the public. 
Sempervivum tectorum like sunshine, and is half shadow resistance. In hot summer, when it enters short dormancy, place it in half in the shade. It is flowering in June to July and the flower color is white or purple.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, white or purple flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, when sunny with fuchsia leaf tips

maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, and resistant to half shade, short period of dormancy in summer, use half shade for better care

maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely

Sempervivum is a well-known one in succulent plants. Plant stature is elegant, fleshy leaves arranged in rosette, leaf color is rich. When sunny, the leaf tip will become red. Succulent plants can match a variety of delicate small plants as miniature landscape, so it is the popular trend in the public. 
Sempervivum like sunshine, and when it is flowering, plants produce a stem which has pink flowers.

basic.floral_language:
Spathiphyllum kochii 
Floriography: self-confidence, pure and good 
Spathiphyllum kochii white, originated in tropical rainforests, a symbol of the smooth sailing. Smooth sailing like anthurium, has a unique spathe. Flower buds are pure and fresh, and inflorescence simple but elegant, graceful, last very long, eagerly anticipated by his just like a pure girl. 
Maintenance is simple, can bloom all year round, flowering for 2-3 months.
basic.blooming: Flowers year around with spathe flower, viewing period 2-3 months

maintenance.soil: Peat covered with a layer of sphagnum moss on soil surface to keep moisture
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, should put in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray water in the air or on leaves, reduce water in winter, keep soil moist
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply liquid fertilizers 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove rotten roots, old diseased and dead leaves timely

basic.floral_language:
Stetsonia coryne 
Floriography: strong, kind, persistent.
Succulent stem of the Stetsonia coryne is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Stetsonia coryne is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.
Stetsonia coryne requires direct bright sunlight for growth. It blooms in certain conditions. Flower color could be light yellow, orange or pink.

basic.floral_language:
Stromanthe sanguinea 
Floriography: beautiful, proud, classical
Native to tropical Central and South America, and the West Indies, Stromanthe sanguinea has beautiful leaves and graceful plant shape. Long oval, thinly leathery leaves with wavy edges, often marked by stripes of various colors.
Stromanthe sanguinea resists shades, suitable for a bright scattered light. Flowers in winter with white flowers.

basic.color: Leaf color green, lower surface fuchsia

basic.floral_language:
Tender yellow green Phalaenopsis 
Floriography: elegant, quiet, wise
Tender yellow green Phalaenopsis has beautiful flowers like butterflies in serene tropical rainforests, one of the three national flowers in Indonesia.
Tender yellow green Phalaenopsis has a graceful looking with tender yellow green flower colors, white aerial roots surround leaves and butterfly-like flowers.
Tender yellow green Phalaenopsis blooms normally in January-February for more than 1-2 months. With modern regulation techniques, Phalaenopsis amabilis can flower year around.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-July, viewing period up to 1-2 months

maintenance.soil: In sphagnum moss, replace once a year
maintenance.sunlight: Before flowering put under gentle sunlight, avoid direct strong light, when flowering put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly every 5-7 days, may water by put the soil in water, may spray water in the air in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly, except flowering stages
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers and diseased leaves; remove peduncle after flowering, except the 2-3 segments at the bottom of peduncle, about 10cm

basic.floral_language:
Viola tricolor
Floriography: happy, sensibility, positive 
Pansy commonly known as the cat's face, is the national flower of Iceland and Poland. 
Each Pansy flower usually has three colors: purple, white and yellow, hence the name. Pansy color is more and richer, all sorts of color collocation together like the cat's face, like a butterfly. Generally plant in the flower bed, garden or balcony. 
Pansy like sunny place and can be sowed all season. Flowering around 2 months after planting, and ornamental period of 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: With different planting time, flowers year around, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Each flower has generally pink, white, yellow in mixture

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, put in sunny places, shade properly under summer strong light when in dormancy
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, short dormancy in summer, reduce watering
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly before flowering, reduce fertilization in summer
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely

Floriography: happy, sensibility, positive 
Pansy commonly known as the cat's face, is the national flower of Iceland and Poland. 
Each Pansy flower usually has three colors: purple, white and yellow, hence the name. Pansy color is more and richer, all sorts of color collocation together like the cat's face, like a butterfly. Generally plant in the flower bed, garden or balcony. 
Pansy like sunny place and can be sowed all season. Flowering around 2 months after planting, and ornamental period of 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: With different planting time, flowers year around, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Each flower has generally pink, white, yellow in mixture

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, put in sunny places, shade properly under summer strong light when in dormancy
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, short dormancy in summer, reduce watering
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly before flowering, reduce fertilization in summer
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely

basic.floral_language:
White Anthurium andraeanum
White Anthurium andraeanumFloriography: enthusiastic, bright, bold and unrestrained 
White Anthurium andraeanumis one of the world precious flowers, cultivated from the flower kingdom of the Netherlands. 
White Anthurium andraeanumflower such as fire, red bud is like a palm, tassel graceful palm a golden yellow flesh, vividly called spathe. Because of their enthusiasm is bold and unrestrained individual character, events like wedding or new store opening, choosing it as decoration, increase the festive atmosphere. 
White Anthurium andraeanummaintenance is simple, can bloom all year round, flowering for 2-3 months.
basic.blooming: Flowers year around with spathe flower, viewing period 2-3 months
basic.color: Leaf color green , bract pure white

maintenance.soil: Peat covered with a layer of sphagnum moss on soil surface to keep moisture
maintenance.sunlight: Likes moderate sunlight, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, may spray water in the air or on leaves, reduce water in winter, keep soil moist
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove rotten roots, old diseased and dead leaves timely

basic.floral_language:
White purple spotted Phalaenopsis
Floriography: elegant, quiet, wise
White purple spotted Phalaenopsis has beautiful flowers like butterflies in serene tropical rainforests, one of the three national flowers in Indonesia.
White purple spotted Phalaenopsis has a graceful looking with white purple spotted flowers, white aerial roots surround leaves and butterfly-like flowers.
White purple spotted Phalaenopsis blooms normally in January-February for more than 1-2 months. With modern regulation techniques, Phalaenopsis amabilis can flower year around.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-July, viewing period up to 1-2 months
basic.color: Flower color white dotted with purple

maintenance.soil: In sphagnum moss, replace once a year
maintenance.sunlight: Before flowering put under gentle sunlight, avoid direct strong light, when flowering put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly every 5-7 days, may water by put the soil in water, may spray water in the air in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly, except flowering stages
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers and diseased leaves; remove peduncle after flowering, except the 2-3 segments at the bottom of peduncle, about 10cm

basic.floral_language:
White Zantedeschia aethiopica 
Floriography: pure, loyal, guileless
White Zantedeschia aethiopica has a noble and classical image in the world. Has a straight upright stem with funnel-shaped flowers, like a horseshoe, very beautiful. Suitable being placed in the balcony, windows, desktop, adding a vivid and exotic atmosphere.
White Zantedeschia aethiopica likes sunny days, full bloom in spring for 1-2 month. After flowering, Leave the bulbs to sprout in the coming year, normally can bloom year after year.
basic.blooming: Flowering period November-May, viewing period 1-2 months

maintenance.soil: Peat and perlite mixed
maintenance.sunlight: Put in sunny places, but avoid strong sunlight at noon, less flowers with less sunlight
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil dries, spray water in the air when relative humidity lower than 30%
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly, except in summer
maintenance.pruning: After flowers fade put in a shaded place, when leaves turn yellow, remove the withered part on the ground, leave tubers for germination next year

basic.floral_language:
xGraptoveria 'Douglas Huth'
Floriography: glorious, tender, lovely
Is a hybrid succulent, leaves loosely arranged in a rosette, long oval shape with tips, covered by a layer of white powders, with great diurnal temperature range and abundant sunlight, leaves turn pink, look glorious, suitable for decoration on desks or in bedrooms. 
Likes sunny places, tolerates to half shade, does not have an apparent dormant period. Flowers sometimes, pale yellow.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, light yellow flowers
basic.color: Leaf color blue green, when sunny turning to pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, resistant to half shade, no apparent period of dormancy
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely

basic.floral_language:
xGraptoveria 'Titubans'
Floriography: noble, beautiful, cozy.
Graptoveria are hybrid crosses between Graptopetalum and Echeveria. Graptoveria 'Titubans' is the hybrid of Graptopetalum paraguayensis and Echeveria derenbergii. Leaves are gray or grayish green, oval, toothed at tips and covered by white powder on the surface as veil. They tightly arrange like a blooming Indian lotus. Tips of the leaves would turn into red then the whole plant is similar to a peony bloom if the plant received plenty of sunlight.
This plant prefers sunny habitat. Non dormant. Yellow flower with red dots blooms once in a while.

basic.color: Leaf color gray white to gray green, when sunny leaf tips turning to pink

maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist, water thoroughly when soil is dry

maintenance.pruning: Remove peduncle and yellowish leaves timely

basic.floral_language:
Yellow Kalanchoe blossfeldiana 
Floriography: happy, optimistic, youth 
The flowers alias star of longevity flowers, a symbol of prosperous, long long time, cultivated from the flower kingdom of the Netherlands. 
Plant type is compact, leaves are green, and color is rich. The flowers are crowned, like a small handfuls of color bright beautiful parasol. Commonly used as decoration in the home, or flower bed.

maintenance.pruning: Remove diseased, yellowing and dropping leaves, pinching 1-2 times, germinate more branched

Zantedeschia has a noble and classical image in the world. Has a straight upright stem with funnel-shaped flowers, like a horseshoe, colorful and beautiful. Suitable being placed in the balcony, windows, desktop, adding a vivid and exotic atmosphere.
Zantedeschia likes sunny days, full bloom in spring for 1-2 month. After flowering, Leave the bulbs to sprout in the coming year, normally can bloom year after year.
basic.blooming: Flowering period November-May, viewing period 1-2 months

maintenance.soil: Peat and perlite mixed
maintenance.sunlight: Put in sunny places, but avoid strong sunlight at noon, less flowers with less sunlight
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil dries, spray water in the air when relative humidity lower than 30%
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly, except in summer
maintenance.pruning: After flowers fade put in a shaded place, when leaves turn yellow, remove the withered part on the ground, leave tubers for germination next year

maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly, except in summer
maintenance.pruning: After flowers fade put in a shaded place, when leaves turn yellow, remove the withered part on the ground, leave tubers for germination next year

basic.blooming: Flowering period August-November

maintenance.soil: Sphagna, bark or coconut loose soil
maintenance.sunlight: Like moderate sunlight, avoid strong direct light, enjoy 2-4 hours sunlight in autumn and winter
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
